verbs.description: [ARG1: phillies] [ARGM-DIS: aaron nola] [V: is] [ARG2: a finalist for nl cy young award aaron nola is one of three finalists for the national league cy young award making him the first phillies pitcher to do so since roy halladay and cliff lee in 2011 by jim salisbury philadelphia phillies colorado cole hamels gabe kapler cy young award cy young max scherzer baseball writers association of america washington nationals nbc nolan arenado mvp mookie betts corey kluber new york mets roy halladay nl manager national league aaron nola jacob degrom phillies al cy young award]
